contact.subHeader: Fill out the form below and I will get back to you within 24 hours. I look forward to speaking with you.

homepage.subheader: I have {{- years}}+ years experience as a Software Engineer and a Web App Developer. This website showcases some of my projects.

aboutMe.aboutMe: I am a Software Engineer located in San Antonio, Texas. I have worked with many different technologies; JavaScript, TypeScript, Node.js, React, and SASS are just a few examples. I have experience working on both personal as well as enterprise-level projects.

contactMe.disclaimer: If I sound like a good fit for your company; Please contact me by clicking below.

projects.subHeader: ### Below are a few personal projects that I have each been created for a different need. They all include many diverse technologies such as **React**, **Redux**, **Hooks**, **Docker Containers**, **OAuth**, and more.
